answers.answer: 3rd nerve palsys  are often very serous and can be due to tumors, strokes, diabetes and the like. So in that sense you are luckly nothing that dire showed up.  At times no cause can be found, that is called "idiopathic 3rd nerve palsy"Its very unusual to have two of them. He may need to be re-evaluated as sometimes things show up the second time but not the first.\Hope he isn't a smoker because "small strokes" due to tobacco use are a common cause.JCH MD
